Detailed Description

\brief Class used to build and manage a master calibration dark 

\par Class:
    MasterDark
\par Purpose:
    Create a master Dark from a list for dark files
\par Description:
        
\par Language:
    PyRaf
\param data
    A list of dark files
\param bpm
    Input bad pixel mask or NULL
\retval 0
    If no error
\author
    JMIbannez, IAA-CSIC
